query.stmt: select bti.account,bti.name,to_char(bti.intrade_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') intrade_date, bti.leaguer_no,bti.leaguer_type,spd.name dept_name,bti.trade_status, decode(bti.sex,1,'男',0,'女')sex, decode(bti.trade_status,0,'未入会',1,'已入会',2,'已退会',3,'欠费被退会') trade_status1 from bi_trade_info bti left join sys_p_department spd on bti.dept_id=spd.id where bti.account=[account]
